name: The Last Resort
description:
Game Description

At  a casino at the end of the universe - the Last Resort - a man who's had a spell of bad luck decides to take fate into his own hands.

Made for McGame Jam 2021 by Team 5 - The Cache Cats.

The Cache Cats Game Designer & Programmer

Owen Campbell

Jacob Dyer

Christina Pilip

Artist

Christina Pilip

Sarah Kind

Music & Sound "Design"

Alex "Stormy" Stewart

Narrative & Story

Sarah Kind

Usage Credits

Creative Commons or Royalty Free Licenses:
- Various effects Recorded by or sampled work recorded by
Mike Koenig and published to Soundbible.com
- Game Over effects sampled works by freesfx.co.uk
- Various coin spillage effects by freesfx.net and freesoundeffect.net, and fesliyanstudios.com

And music influences:
- Tracks all utilize the melodic series of the first two measures of "Giant Steps"
- Other influences include the works of Simon Viklund, and the original scores for
Heat and Ocean's Eleven.
- These were not used to the extent where attribution was required;
they are listed anyways because they were consciously drawn from from .
- In the Stage 2 track, a shortened version of the opening melody of Giant Steps is used, with rhythm and harmony greatly altered. Spirit of full disclosure and all.
